abstract: Marysville Journal; two-day Bok Kai festival has been popular in Marysville, Calif, since the 1880s; celebration honors Bok Eye, Chinese water god thought to keep flooding at bay for city located at juncture of two rivers.
lead_paragraph: The Bok Kai festival, a two-day celebration, has been going strong in Marysville, Calif., since the 1880s.

headline.main: Bok Kai Festival in Marysville Brings Touch of 19th Century to 21st
headline.print_headline: Chinese-American Festival Brings a Touch of the 19th Into the 21st Century

snippet: The Bok Kai festival, a two-day celebration, has been going strong in Marysville, Calif., since the 1880s.
